verbs.description: Video of [ARG1: President Trump] [V: touching] down [ARGM-LOC: in Tel Aviv] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] shows the First Lady very clearly slapping at her husband when he tried to hold her hand at Ben Gurion Airport .
